code: import React,{useEffect}from"react";import{connect}from"react-redux";import{CountBasketProducts,getAppleThunk,getBasketThunk,getXiaomiThunk,initializeApp}from"./Redux/Reducer";import App from"./App";var AppContainer=function AppContainer(_ref){var getAppleThunk=_ref.getAppleThunk,getXiaomiThunk=_ref.getXiaomiThunk,getBasketThunk=_ref.getBasketThunk,CountBasketProducts=_ref.CountBasketProducts,basket=_ref.basket;var Count=basket.map(function(c){return c.count;});useEffect(function(){var a=0;for(var i=0;i<basket.length;i++){a=a+Count[i];}CountBasketProducts(a);});useEffect(function(){getAppleThunk();},[getAppleThunk]);useEffect(function(){getXiaomiThunk();},[getXiaomiThunk]);useEffect(function(){getBasketThunk();},[getBasketThunk]);return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(App,null);};var mapStateToProps=function mapStateToProps(state){return{apple:state.Reducer.apple,xiaomi:state.Reducer.xiaomi,basket:state.Reducer.basket};};export default connect(mapStateToProps,{getAppleThunk:getAppleThunk,getXiaomiThunk:getXiaomiThunk,getBasketThunk:getBasketThunk,CountBasketProducts:CountBasketProducts,initializeApp:initializeApp})(AppContainer);
